(a) Using the data in the table, calculate each of the following and show your work.

(i) Fehran’s real GDP in <math alttext="2012" overflow="scroll"><mtext>2012</mtext></math>

(ii) The inflation rate in Fehran from <math alttext="2011" overflow="scroll"><mtext>2011</mtext></math> to <math alttext="2012" overflow="scroll"><mtext>2012</mtext></math>

(b) Fehran is the only producer and exporter of electric vehicles. Assume the price level among Fehran’s trading partners remains the same and the inflation rate calculated in part (a)(ii) is reflective of price changes for electric vehicles. As a result of the change in the relative price level, would foreign importers buy more or fewer electric vehicles from Fehran in <math alttext="2012" overflow="scroll"><mtext>2012</mtext></math> compared to <math alttext="2011" overflow="scroll"><mtext>2011</mtext></math>? Explain.

(c) Did the standard of living of the average person in Fehran increase, decrease, or stay the same between <math alttext="2011" overflow="scroll"><mtext>2011</mtext></math> and <math alttext="2012" overflow="scroll"><mtext>2012</mtext></math>? Explain.

(d) What effect will the changes in Fehran's government budget between <math alttext="2011" overflow="scroll"><mtext>2011</mtext></math> and <math alttext="2012" overflow="scroll"><mtext>2012</mtext></math> have on Fehran's national debt? Explain.
